name: INUIHostedViewSiriProviding
desc: Methods for hiding portions of the default interfaces that Siri provides.

items.name: var displaysMap: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether your view controller replaces any default map interface.

items.name: var displaysMessage: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether your view controller replaces the default message interface that Siri provides.

items.name: var displaysPaymentTransaction: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean indicating whether your view controller replaces the default payment transaction interface that Siri provides.
